19-year old Jenna Green slowly awoke. The voluptuous young brunette yawned, and got ready to start her day.

For some reason, though, the bed sheets were heavier today, and her pillow felt larger. She opened her eyes, and was shocked to see her bed was the size of a football field!

Though she was scared, Jenna needed to find out what happened. She slowly stood up. She looked down, and the only things that shrunk with her were her panties and bra. It was chilly, but she started to venture across her bed.

She estimated herself to be one centimeter tall. All of a sudden, her mother burst in her door.

"JENNA! WHERE ARE YOU!" she yelled, sounding like a mythic god to small Jenna.

"Mom, I'm here!" she yelled to the top of her voice, but her mother didn't hear her.

She then looked at the bed.

"Hmm. Her sheets need to be washed".

11111112.content:
Jenna tried to escape the cage, but wasn't strong enough to open the latch, and bending the wires, which were like steel bars to her, was right out.
A little defeated, Jenna decided to instead go and look around the cage.
Walking around, the wood chips chafing and prodding her feet, and weren't very stable either...

The cage was surprisingly clean, Sarah was talking about wanting a new pet for a while...
The food bowl was empty, the water bottle (luckily?) wasn't. There was a small, plastic hamster wheel in the corner, and a... hamster toilet in the other...
In the front left corner there was a plastic hide box, somewhat shaped like a log cabin. Looking in, it was filled with cotton fluff or something.
After about half an hour of looking around, Jenna gave up. Maybe she could convince Sarah to let her go later, but there was no way she'd be able to escape this cage on her own. This small, child friendly, discount store, pet cage...
Jenna went up to the cotton fluff, and decided to sit down. Eventually, she started to doze off a little.

At least an hour later, Jenna was loudly awakened by the sound of the door slamming shut.
Making her way out of the box, she was too late, and Sarah started tapping the wires of the cage.
"SQUEAKY! COME OUT COME OUT WHEREVER YOU ARE!" Sarah spoke, before she started laughing at Jenna, groggily covering her ears, just outside the tiny house.
"Squeaky?!" Jenna asked.
"YOUR NAME IS SQUEAKY NOW!" her little sister said. "PETS SHOULD HAVE PET NAMES!"
"But -"
"OH! I'VE GOT SOMETHING FOR YOU!" Sarah remembered, and raised... an almost empty hamburger box.
Opening the latch, she took out "Jenna's" food bowl, and when it returned, Jenna saw it was filled with the remains of a hamburger and some french fries, bitten in (supposedly) little chunks. She was feeding Jenna. Her own baby sister was feeding Jenna food scraps...

Sarah leaned closer, looking at Jenna like she was a little pet. "SQUEAKY NOT HUNGRY?" Jenna shook no. "THEN LET'S PLAY!"
"Wha- What are we gonna play?" Jenna gulped, hoping to play along until she could convince Sarah to show her to their mother, or at least sneak away when her "little" sister wasn't looking. "Dolls? Hide-and-go-seek? A board game?"
Her little sister's face lit up, probably happy about Jenna playing along, and she pointed past Jenna. Pointing to the hamster wheel behind her.
"Wha- NO! I'm not a hamster!" Jenna yelled. "I'm not gonna run in some stupid wheel!"
Sarah frowned, and her hand moved into the cage. Rather than move her out, though, she moved her into the wheel.
"SQUEAKY, PLAY." her sister commanded. "GO!" ... at least she didn't sound too angry?

But Jenna decided sh didn't have much of a choice; she didn't want to make an enemy of her giant baby sister.
She started running, in the corner of her eyes she could see Sarah look less angry.
After running for about a minute, the wheel suddenly went really fast, Jenna falling over, and getting carried around. Sarah had given the wheel a little push, and was clearly laughing at her "big" sister spinning around. Eventually, the wheel stopped abruptly, a giant thumb pressing down on the wheel.
"THAT WAS FUNNY!" she had still not completely stopped laughing. "NOW WERE-"
The door flew open, and their mother, walked into the room. "SARAH, HAVE YOU SEEN JENNA?"
"YES, MOMMY!" Sarah said. Her hand left the cage, and she turned to face her mother, though not before closing the latch. "SHE'S RIGHT HERE! SHE'S MY PET NOW!" she turned a little aside to show off Jenna in the cage.

As her mother, rolling her eyes, started walking closer towards the cage, Jenna ran up to the edge of the cage and started waving: this could be her way out of here!
Maria looked down, and gasped. Jenna really was there; the size of a hamster and dressed in only her underwear, but definitely there.
She bent over to get a closer look. Regaining herself, her mother started talking. But not to Jenna.
"SARAH? " her mother turned away from the cage and faced her youngest daughter.
"YES, MOMMY?" she seemed actually surprised. After all, she'd already told her about Jenna before.
"WHY IS YOUR SISTER TINY?" her mother put her hand on her hips, a display of authority that gave Jenna some hope.
"DUNNO. I FOUND HER LIKE THAT." Sarah answered, puzzled, but, unfortunately, not concerned.
"I woke up li-" Jenna wanted to add to the conversation, but Sarah started tapping the cage again to shut her up. "SHUSH, SQUEAKY!"
"DON'T DO THAT, DEAR, THAT'S MEAN." her mother said "WHY IS SHE IN A CAGE?" Jenna wasn't sure, looking at the back of her mother's head from below and all, but she thought she could see her raise an eyebrow.
"BECAUSE SHE'S TINY AND CUTE AND MY PET NOW! I'VE NAMED HER SQUEAKY!" Sarah perked up, obviously finding this all very amusing.
A short pause followed. Their mother looked puzzled; this wasn't and everyday problem, after all. She even leaned closer to the cage to get a better look at Jenna.
Finally, she turned back to Sarah.
11111112.title: Stuck until Sarah returns...

111111121.content:
Maria looked at her young daughter and said, "Sarah, you have to get rid of those woodchips."

Both Jenna and Sarah were confused, "why, mommy?" Sarah inquired.

"Squeaky isn't like Chuckles Sweetie," Maria pointed out. Jenna couldn't believe her mother just used the stupid pet name Sarah had given her, "remember when you lost your shoes at the park and got that splinter?"

Sarah frowned, "Yeah, that hurt a lot."

"Well, Squeaky can't walk comfortably in those woodchips like Chuckles could, especially when she doesn't have shoes."

Sarah reached into the cage, and despite Jenna's protests, took her shrunken sister into her hand, "I'm sorry, Squeaky, I didn't know."

"I'll watch Squeaky while you dump the woodchips, Sweetie," Maria offered as she held out her hand.

Sarah happily put Jenna in her mother's hand, "thank you, Mommy," Sarah thanked as she kissed her mother on the cheek, "be good Squeaky, I'll be right back," she promised.

After Sarah left the room, Jenna looked up at Maria, "Mom, please tell me you're joking," she said hopefully.

"I'm quite serious young lady, you've been out of control lately and haven't been pulling your weight around here, and I think some time as Sarah's pet will do you well she's been begging you to spend time with her for months, and I think you owe it to her." Maria lectured.

"But what if I get stuck like this?" Jenna demanded.


"I'm sure Sarah will take good care of you." Maria coldly replied.

Jenna was about to argue when the door opened and Sarah came back in with the cage, "I dumped the woodchips Squeaky, and look I put a washcloth was down, so it's nice and comfy."

"That's very considerate of you, Sarah," Maria praised, "now Sweetie, if you want to keep Squeaky, you have to take care of her; do you promise to do that?"

"I do, Mommy," Sarah promised, "I'll feed her, make sure she has lots of water, clean up after her, and I'll make sure she has lots of fun." Jenna didn't think she'd like any fun Sarah had in mind, and she found herself pulled into a tight hug as Sarah took her back from Maria. "We're going to be best friends."


With a pat on the head, Maria left Sarah and Jenna alone, and with a smile, Sarah announced, "let's play more Squeaky you're super fun!"

1111121112.content:
Jenna paddled desperately in the fowl smelling yellow water, screaming up at her little sister not to flush. But it was useless, the little girls just smiled and moved to do what she had been taught to do once she was done with her business. All Jenna could do was watch as that little hand that was now big enough to hold her with ease clutched at the toilet handle and pulled it down.

Only for nothing to happen!

Sara toggled the handle over and over with a confused frown, not understanding. Jenna could almost cry with relief as she realized that the toilet must be broken. No trip through the pipes for her! But she still had to get out of the toilet, she still needed Sara’s help.

“Sara!” Jenna called out to her younger sister. “Sara, the toilet’s broken, you can’t flush it. Just get me out of here and take me to mom, please!” she was really getting desperate now. This had been too close, clearly she couldn’t trust Sara with her safety.

Sara continued to mess with the handle for a bit more before she huffed in defeat, sticking her lower lip out rather cutely. Finally, she looked back down at Jenna, still frowning. “ Guess I’ll just have to leave it.”

Jenna’s panic started rising again. “SARA! Please, get me OUT!” she started splashing more erratically, her arms getting tiered; she’d never been much of an athlete. “SARA!!!”

Sara looked in at her little big sister. She thought it was funny watching her flail around like that, the fact that she was swimming in Sara’s pee was even funnier. But, at the plea to be helped out, Sara scrunched up her face in disgust. “Ew, no, you’re all covered in tinkle. Mom said not to touch that.”

Jenna couldn’t believe this. Her sister dropped her in here and now refuses to get her out because it’s gross! This really couldn’t be happening right now! “Sara, please! Just get me out of here, I’m begging you!”

Just then they both heard their mother calling them for breakfast, telling them that if they don’t hurry they’ll be late for school. Before Jenna could try and reason with Sara again, her sister cut her off. “ I gotta go now. bye Jenna!” Jenna screamed as her sister shut the lid on the toilet and walked away, leaving Jenna trapped in smelly darkness.
1111121112.title: Flushed... or not...

11111211122.content:
Jenna continued to doggy paddle around the bowl, using the limited light that filtered in from under the edge of the toilet seat and lid so far up above, in hopes of finding some way out. Her sister hadn’t even used toilet paper for crying out loud! Jenna whimpered in the darkness; her arms were really starting to get tiered.

Just then, she heard the muffled booms of someone approaching. It was too powerful to be her sister, so it had to be her mother! Oh, maybe she could get out of this situation after all! She could even hear her mother calling for her in an increasingly irritated tone. She heard the voice fade away for a few minutes with the booming steps, making Jenna worry again, but then she started coming back!

Mary poked her head into the upstairs bathroom, annoyed that she couldn’t seem to find her oldest anywhere. When she had asked Sara at breakfast, she had just said that Jenna was in the toilet. Mary had assumed that her youngest had meant to say that Jenna was going to the bathroom, so she had dismissed it at the time. But now Sara was on her way to school and Jenna was nowhere to be seen. Mary had checked the entire upstairs by this point, and she was starting to think that Jenna had just gone to school without a word. That was pretty unusual for her, but maybe that talk they’d had last night about responsibility and getting better grades had had an effect; or maybe Jenna was mad about getting grounded and was retaliating by avoiding her mother, again…

Shaking it off, Mary decided not to worry about it anymore. Being in the bathroom at this time, Mary felt the sudden urge to go. Approaching the porcelain throne, Mary’s old ears failed to pick up on the faint screams and cries for help coming from inside the bowl. When Mary lifted the lid off the toilet, she sees…

11111212211.content:
Jenna looked up the wad of gum less than an inch (to her) away from her face when suddenly it stopped. Sarah removed her foot and was looking down at Jenna in complete shock. “Wha… I… you…” Sarah stammered. Grasped Jenna in her hands and returned the doll-sized teen to her bed but this time continued to look at her shrunken sister than to her feet before tearing off her shoes and throwing them aside. However, Sarah watched her footwear hit the ground with a small thud and gasped, she looked at Jenna and then all around the room. “You’re tiny!” Sarah spoke.

Jenna was annoyed, “really? I had no idea.”

“No,” Sarah said, “I mean you’re the same size as my Barbies, but you’re not all hard like them. If I stepped on you, I would have squished you like a bug!”

“Right,” Jenna replied still not seeing where Sarah was going with this.

“You’re so little, there are so many things that could hurt you,” Sarah explained.

“Exactly,” Jenna smiled, “that’s why you’ve got to take me to mo…”

But Jenna’s sentence was cut off as Sarah pulled her into a hug, “don’t worry Jenna, I’ll keep you safe,” she promised. Sarah returned her sister to her Ariel pillow, “you stay here.”

Jenna watched as Sarah went about her room doing something their mother had been trying to get her to do for years; cleaning. Sarah put away her toys, picked up her dirty clothes, put her shoes in the closet, put away every crayon or marker she could find and threw away every piece of litter and general junk she had once insisted was a precious treasure. “There,” Sarah said satisfied, “now you can move around on the floor, and I can see you so I won’t step on you.”

Jenna was starting to see. Sarah had, at last, realized her sister was not a doll and was beginning to see the shrunken teen as human. Perhaps if Jenna could play along with Sarah for a little while, she could get her sister to understand she needed to be returned to her proper size.

She finished breakfast and decided to let the girl suffer in her slipper a little longer while she caught up on some paper work.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------- ---------------

Jenna had crawled along the edge of the slipper for an hour but her effort had finally paid off. Now near the heel of the slipper and Michelle's foot, she was clear to escape. Looking up, she noticed the giantess was sitting, busy with something far beyond Jenna's field of vision. Jenna ran through the last section of slipper and prepared to jump. Looking down, it was about a 15' drop. "I'm so small... What am I doing?" She said to herself. "But I don't have much choice, Michelle's nuts" With that she lept off the slipper and onto the hard wood floor. Landing with a thud, she gathered herself before receiving that tingling feeling again.

"NOT AGAIN" Jenna said as her world expanded around her. But this time much less than before, a quick estimation put her a 1/25" of an inch, barely a speck. Shocked but undeterred the mite size girl runs as fast as she can. She doesn't get very far when she hears Michelle speak.

"TIME TO CHECK ON MY LITTLE FRIEND" Michelle bellows.

"Oh no, I've got to find somewhere to hide" peering around Jenna looks for anything but any cover seems miles away. What makes matters worse is Michelle seems to have discovered that Jenna was gone.

"WHERE'D YOU GO!" Michelle booms, "YOU BETTER BE IN MY SHOE OR YOUR IN BIG TROUBLE"

The titaness gets up grabbing her magnifying glass off the desk. Jenna quickly spots an overturned purse under the desk only about a 1/4 mile from her location (at her perspective). Running as fast as she can towards it, she looks back, seeing Michelle on her hands and knees scanning the floor for any sign of the mite size girl. Every move makes is an earthquake to Jenna, who is running with all her might to make it to safety. One more glance over her shoulder, as Michelle is looking in her direction.

"I'm not going to make it" She says sprinting as fast as she can.

Does she make it?!!

Jenna screamed in horror as a huge fleshy wall slammed in front of her. At Jenna's perspective, it was well over 150' tall and 1000' long. Staring at it, Jenna realized it wasn't a wall at all but Michelle's index finger.

"WELL, WELL MY DEAR, IT SEEMS YOU'VE GOTTEN EVEN SMALLER" Michelle boomed, "AND IT SEEMS LIKE YOU WERE TRYING TO RUN AWAY FROM ME. HOW DISAPPOINTING..."

Slowly Jenna watched as the huge "wall" rotated 180 degrees bringing Michelle's upturned finger nail to the floor.

"I SUGGEST YOU CLIMB ON BEFORE I DECIDE YOU'RE NOT WORTH THE TROUBLE" Michelle spoke, this time without the playfulness that usually accompanied it. Jenna seeing her dire situation hurried to the upturned nail. At Jenna's new size the nail seemed a good 18" thick. Jenna climbed on and was pushed to the "floor" as Michelle stood up. Jenna's world swirled and finally stopped in front of one of Michelle's titanic eyes. Jenna shivered at the cold stare coming from the huge eye. She awaited in total fear for what Michelle said next.

"YOU'VE DISAPPOINTED ME. AND NOW YOU MUST BE PUNISHED" Jenna's world again shifted and Michelle lowered her finger about an inch over her desk. Jenna screamed as she fell over 100' (at her scale), onto the desk and immediately saw the huge ring around her again. Jenna looked up at a Michelle's cold face.

"FOR NOW, YOU THINK ABOUT WHAT YOU'VE DONE", Michelle boomed and walked away. Jenna sat and cried......

------------------------------------

After some time, Jenna was shaken as Michelle returned carrying....

"no please!" Jenna screamed, but at her ultra tiny size, it was no use. Jenna watched as the ring was quickly removed and a titanic finger tip came racing toward her. Jenna did the best she could to run but it's hard to get anywhere when you're a 1/25" tall. The giant pad slammed into her, like a 3 ton pillow and it's oily surface stuck her to it like a fly to fly paper. Jenna's world swirled as she was brought in front of Michelle's gigantic blue eye.

"YOU'LL LEARN THAT YOU'RE NOTHING BUT A SPECK WITHOUT MY HELP AND A DAY IN MY HEELS SHOULD DO THE TRICK."

Jenna tried to speak but before she could get a word out her world spun again and she was face to face with the toe end with one of Michelle's heels. Jenna was roughly rubbed onto it's leathery surface. The flea sized girl turned around to see Michelle's hand grab the top of the shoe and lower it to the floor.

"michelle please!" Jenna pleaded but to no avail. She watched in complete terror as Michelle's foot entered into the arena sized shoe. She braced herself as Michelle's second toe slammed into her sending her bouncing around. She landed with a thud on the soft warm surface of Michelle's big toe.

Jenna knew this was going to be a long day...... What does she do?

choices: The Mary Janes on the right
1111212221211121111122.content:
Jenna rolled over and looked around. She was still trapped in the giant ring on Michelle's titanic desk. It was finally Monday morning and she was glad the weekend was over. The last 48 hours had been horrific. Michelle had come up with several "games" for the two of them to play which included dodging giant feet and teeth, being stuck to various body parts while Michelle went through her day, being trapped in a locket and much more Jenna didn't want to think about. But now, it was Monday morning, and her plan could finally go into action...

---------------------------------------------------------------------------- ----------------------------------------------------------

Michelle smiled, walking to her desk and seeing the speck of a girl trapped in her ring. She didn't even speak to the girl. Moving the ring, she licked her index finger and lightly touching it to the minute girl and lifted the finger to her face. She giggled slightly at the sight and spoke.

"Well my dear the weekend is sadly over." The blond spoke to tiny Jenna, "And I have to go to work for now. But don't worry, you'll be spending the day with me!!"

Moving her finger she lowered it towards the pair of pumps she planned to wear today. As gently as she could, she tapped the small girl off her finger and into the toe section of the pump.

"Now keep my feet happy and we'll play later" She spoke again, sliding her foot into the shoe.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------- -------------------------------------------------------

Jenna, now soaked in saliva, ran into the toe section of the pump. She was relieved that she was riding in Michelle's shoe, not because of comfort, but because of the hope of escape. As the toes entered, she braced herself, and began to move. During the car ride, she climbed the toes and was small enough to fit between the space between Michelle's foot and the top of the pump. However, by the time she was out, she realized Michelle was walking to her office. She clung to the top of the foot as Michelle walked through the door and sat down. Another bit of luck was that Michelle didn't even bother checking on her, assuming Jenna was snug and safe in her pump.

Planning her next move, the giantess bellowed, speaking into the phone. "DANIELLE, PLEASE COME IN AND BRING SAMANTHA"

Jenna was ecstatic! It sounded as if Michelle had hired Sam and she was here. Hope filled her once again! Jenna heard the door open and saw two pairs of feet walk in and sit across from Michelle's desk. She lifted herself onto the pump and ran towards it's tip. She jumped off and landed safely on the ground, unhurt.

"Apparently there is some advantage to being this size" Jenna thought to herself. Looking up at the shoe, it was well over 100' tall. With what little energy she had left she ran towards the two pair of feet. However, she did not know which pair was Sam's and which was this Danielle's. On the left was a person wearing pair of stiletto heels and on the right was a person wearing a pant suit and what looked to be Mary Janes.

"Which one is she??!" Jenna said to herself as the 3 giants booming voices spoke high above her.

She had to decide quick, not know which pair belonged to her mother's good friend.

She chose.....

"SINCE SHE IS PROVING DIFFICULT TO WATCH, I THINK I'M GOING TO NEED YOUR HELP ON THIS ONE, DANIELLE" she bellowed. Jenna's ears perked as Michelle explained her plan for Jenna.

"I WANT YOU TO....

Your spirit suddenly teleports to a new location. When you're able to focus, you see a lot of girls like you. You seem to be inside a giant home. You float up to one of the girls and ask what is going on. They smile and somehow put their hand on your shoulder.

"My name is Tracy. You got shrunk and were killed. As you can see, many girls had a similar fate. You see, there is a witch who flies around at night and shrinks random girls. The witch doesn't like teenagers, and female teenagers are the worst to her. Luckily, her spell that was used to shrink us also created a place for us to go when we die. We're all friends here, this is our home now. We all died like this, I tried to get my brother's attention when he was in the kitchen. I stood on his plate and he mistook me for food and ate me. That girl over there was sat on by her friend." Tracy said, pointing to someone else. She then asked how you died. You explained you got stuck in the washer. "Well it looks like you died in a unique way, I've never heard of someone dying that way."

"What is there to do around here?" You ask.

"We hang out, or watch tv. We have special channels only for us."

"Not to offend you, but is there anyway to come back alive?" Tracy gets a serious look.

"I'm not offended, but the journey is hard. Basically, you can return to Earth in a new body, but you only get three lives, you already used one. Every time you go back, you start to look more like a toy to humans. If you go back now, you're body will be softer than the first, like a plush toy. It's a little harder to die, but you can't speak English. If you die and go back again, you'll return as a doll. Still can't speak, but there's another downside too. Girls who see you will become attracted to you and will have a harder time listening to you. They'll want to play, . . . or hurt you. If you die again after that, you'll be stuck here with us. I haven't used my extra lives left, but some of the others have." You couldn't believe all of this.

"Is this from the witch's magic?" Your friend nods.

"Yes, it might be because she loves to know that we continue to struggle on Earth. Are you still going to go back? I'll come with you if you are, it's been 20 years since I've been on Earth."

12312112222.content:
"Come on, let's go find the babysitter," Jenna said. "She's our only chance right now with Mom gone."
Rachel got to her feet and the two mosquito-sized girls started the very, very long walk to the living room, dodging dust bunnies, cracks, and clods of dirt along the way.
Jenna sighed, "You know, Rachel, I've been thinking. We're too tiny for anyone to notice us now. We would just look like little specks to them, if they see us at all."
"That's the story of my life," she muttered. "You're saying we're stuck like this forever?"
"I think we need to try something drastic," Jenna looked disturbed. "We're way too small to climb on anything and get to a higher place so that someone might see us. That means we're stuck here on the floor. No one will ever see us while we're this size, unless they're three inches tall."
Rachel's eyes went wide, "You want to SHRINK someone? The babysitter? Sounds like it might be fun, but... can we actually do that?"
"I don't think we have any other choice. If we don't get help, our lifespans will look pretty similar to our height. Either we shrink her and take the chance that something MIGHT happen to her or that we won't find a way to unshrink her... or we die. But I'm still wondering if I can make myself do it."
"Let's at least try to get her attention first. We can try that if we absolutely have to. Besides, we don't even know how to shrink her with the bracelet. We might just end up shrinking ourselves even smaller! Gosh, I HATE being this tiny!" A tear slid down her cheek.
Jenna gave her a warm smile, "Oh, cheer up, you little midget, or I'll squish you!"
That got a small laugh out of Rachel. "I'll try, Thumbelina."
"Good," said Jenna, "Being shrunk might not be so bad. I think I'd actually enjoy it if I didn't have to worry about fighting for my life. But I'd much rather be three inches tall than Bacteria Girl. It would be fun if I knew that I could get back to normal size anytime I wanted."
Finally, they came to the living room, where they saw Anna, the short fifteen-year-old blond girl next door, sitting on the couch reading.
"Anna?" said Jenna, "I guess she's the babysitter. Let's go."
It was only then that she noticed with a sinking feeling that she was walking from hardwood floor into the carpet. Each strand of the carpet was twice her height, turning the living room into a jungle.
"This is bad," said Rachel. "We might not be able to see any threats coming, like getting stepped on, if we can't see above the carpet. How can it be taller than us?!"
12312112222.title: The Chances Look Small...Not to Mention the Girls

123121122221.content:
With determination far surpassing their size, the micro girls walked into the vast jungle of the carpet. It was such a strange, surreal feeling walking among the strands, like something out of a dream. Every so often, one of them would climb up to the top of a carpet strand to check their position and make sure they were going the right way.
"Hey, Rachel!" Jenna shrieked gleefully from the top of the layer of carpet, "She's wearing sandals! This is wonderful!"
"Why is it wonderful?" Rachel asked, puzzled and exhausted.
"That means her skin is exposed! If she were wearing real shoes, she would never be able to feel us climbing on her foot. We could never get her attention. But now, when we get there we can both jump up and down on her foot and her skin will be much more sensitive."
"I don't know," Rachel said, "Will that work? Well, let's look on the bright side. The two of us together make one quarter-of-an-inch tall girl. She's more likely to feel our combined weight."
When the girls the mountain-sized foot, they were exhausted beyond belief.
"It's almost over," Jenna wheezed encouragingly.
"We have to climb THAT?" Rachel said doubtfully, "I can't believe I'm about to climb someone's bare toes!"
"Oh, at least she has nice feet," Jenna shrugged, "I wish I had HER toes." She looked down at her feet.
"That's true. At least her feet aren't smelly."

Rachel gave Jenna a boost on her shoulders. Once on top, Jenna lay on her stomach and Rachel jumped to reach her hand so she could pull her up. It took some doing, but they made it. Without warning, Anna started wiggling her toes absentmindedly. Rachel and Jenna shrieked as they were tossed around in the earthquake. It seemed that their bodies were tougher at this size. They had to be. Like the way ants were able to lift things bigger than themselves. The toe had stopped for the moment, but both girls knew that their strength couldn't hold out much longer.
"Now what?" Rachel grunted under the strain.
"We have to shrink her. It's our only choice! She'll kill us if we don't." Jenna shrieked.

"We'll find a different way of reading it. If it does shrink us, we'll be smaller than a grain of sand. So tiny that we'll probably be safe. We have to take the chance."
Rachel nodded, with fear in her eyes, "Why don't we try reading the bracelet while we're not touching it. Have her touch it instead of us."
They maneuvered the bracelet across the surface of Anna's flip flop with their tiny feet. They got it to where it was braced against the sole of Anna's foot, but not touching them. "Well, it's obvious there's nothing we can do about it. You'll j
124.content:
Jenna wasn't sure what the next course of action would be, but after thinking for a second, she decided she was in no hurry to be unshrunk. She wanted to explore this exciting new giant world she had found herself in. She had always thought of herself as too tall anyway, and was excited to see what it was like to be Thumbelina. Still being a little tired, though, she smiled and decided and to go back to sleep. She awoke later to the sound of a small voice yelling in her ear. Turning her head to see where the voice was coming from, she froze in shock. Her first thought was that she had gone back to normal size, but when she looked around, her room was still gigantic. She was still tiny. Her mouth hung open. She wasn't big again, there really WAS a girl even tinier than her standing there on the pillow, trying to get her attention.
She gasped, "Who are you? How did you get here? And...so...small...?"
The incredibly tiny girl was not much bigger than Jenna's thumb. She was very pretty, with light brown hair, and was dressed similarly to Jenna: barefoot, wearing a halter top and shorts. From her clothing, it looked like she had been shrunk in her sleep too.
"I'm so sorry," she said, "but I was desperate. I had to shrink you, because I'm much too small for anyone of normal size to notice me. I have to get unshrunk and the only way to do that was by making you tiny enough to see me."
Jenna sat up and yawned, "Oh, don't worry about it. I like being tiny. I'm excited to try it out! But how did you get so small?"
The girl seemed intimidated and shyly looked down at her bare feet, "I was shrunk in my sleep just like you were. I can't make myself bigger, but I found the method that was used to shrink me. I tried it on myself, hoping it would make me big again. But instead it just made me even smaller. I used it to shrink you too."
Jenna looked at the near-microscopic girl and said,
124.title: A Tiny Visitor

info.brief_description: A teenage girl is shrunken and must struggle to stay alive!
info.description:
Your basic shrinking story.

A few rules:

1. No sex or rape or etc.
2. This is an adventure story, so try to keep it so she has to struggle or such.
3. Try to keep it so nobody notices her.

Also, please try to spell check, and take the time to use correct puncuation. And please don't use all-caps or no-caps.
